solution_line_template: The total cost of food that the cow ate for the forty days is {days_kept}*${food_cost_per_day} = $<<{days_kept}*{food_cost_per_day}={total_food_cost}>>{total_food_cost}

To feed and maintain the health of the cow, the total expenses Jett used is ${vaccination_deworming_cost}+${total_food_cost} = $<<{vaccination_deworming_cost}+{total_food_cost}={total_health_expenses}>>{total_health_expenses}
If he sold the cow at ${cow_selling_price}, Jett made a profit of ${cow_selling_price}-${total_cost_on_cow} = $<<{cow_selling_price}-{total_cost_on_cow}={profit}>>{profit}
